name: SANTACORPS: Moonlight Tango
description:
Looks like Christmas came late this year! 

JOIN SANTACORPS, The North Pole's finest, in Virtuoso Neomedia's very first Christmas Special production!

  • High Octane Cozycore Action -  become Father (or Mother!) Christmas  and pilot your own magical ReinTech sleigh 
  • Continuous City-To-Interior Gameplay - Perform death-defying swan dives thru narrow chimneys to deliver presents, decorate trees, and generally spread raddical cheer
  • Fully procedural Levels - From cityscape to interiors to your SANTACORPS Operative, every playthrough is unique!
  • All new tunes by SKYBRIDGE and ROSHI'S GARDEN
  • Supports most popular gamepads

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys (Left Stick) :

             Steer sleigh, walk around

Space (Square on DualShock, X on Xbox): 

               Jump in/out of sleigh

Z: (X on DualShock, A on Xbox)

                Throttle

X: (O on DualShock, B on Xbox)

                  Boost
